body: I thought I'd make another AMA. If anyone has a question for me, post it below and I'll try to respond as soon as possible.
body_tagged: I thought I'd make another AMA. If anyone has a question for me, post it below and I'll try to respond as soon as possible.
title: Ask Me Anything!

replies.body: How do you feel? Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: How do you feel? Opinions on me?

replies.body:
How long was your trial?
Who were your batch buddies (If you know)
First impression on your promotion?
First impression on myself?
Thoughts on Acceqted :3?
Favourite Colour?
Favourite Gametype?
Favourite map?

Congrats on mod!!
replies.body_tagged:
How long was your trial?
Who were your batch buddies (If you know)
First impression on your promotion?
First impression on myself?
Thoughts on Acceqted :3?
Favourite Colour?
Favourite Gametype?
Favourite map?

Congrats on mod!!

replies.body:
Surprised. I didn't expect to be promoted. I'm also a bit nervous. =)
You're honest and quite sociable, and overall I think you're quite cool to talk to.
replies.body_tagged:
Surprised. I didn't expect to be promoted. I'm also a bit nervous. =)
You're honest and quite sociable, and overall I think you're quite cool to talk to.

reply_to.body: How do you feel? Opinions on me?
reply_to.body_tagged: How do you feel? Opinions on me?

replies.body:
1. Two weeks.
  2. Not exactly sure what you mean, but I was promoted to junior moderator around the same time as ThatIsReallyHot and SpookeZZ.
  3. It's quite a demanding job, but it's quite enjoyable, if a bit taxing. xD
  4. You're funny, cheerful, sociable and fun to talk to. =)
  5. Red.
  6. Nexus.
  7. Clay Wars.

Thanks! =)
replies.body_tagged:
1. Two weeks.
  2. Not exactly sure what you mean, but I was promoted to junior moderator around the same time as ThatIsReallyHot and SpookeZZ.
  3. It's quite a demanding job, but it's quite enjoyable, if a bit taxing. xD
  4. You're funny, cheerful, sociable and fun to talk to. =)
  5. Red.
  6. Nexus.
  7. Clay Wars.

Thanks! =)
